com.github.protobufel

Class MessageAdapter<T extends com.google.protobuf.MessageOrBuilder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.protobufel.MessageAdapter<T>

  • public class MessageAdapter<T extends com.google.protobuf.MessageOrBuilder>
extends Object
    A MessageOrBuilder adapter with useful extensions and utilities.
    Author:
    protobufel@gmail.com David Tesler
